summary.name: Polaroid instax mini 90
summary.description: One of the successful polaroids in Fujifilm is Instax mini 90 which was created under the concept of "NEO CLASSIC," is also packed with additional features and capabilities like macro mode and high performance flash. It has a classic design and includes cutting-edge capabilities like bulb and multiple exposures, which are the difference and distinct to the classic Polaroids cameras. Plus, this instant camera provide a greater capacity to creatively capture light. There are five modes icnluding kids mode, landscape mode, double express mode, party mode, and bulb exposure mode to make people choose according to different shoot situation and objects.

overview.name: Lithium-ion Batteries (LIB)
overview.description: Due to their high energy density and voltage, lithium-ion batteries are employed in a wide variety of items that we use every day. The demand for high-capacity, high-voltage, and secure secondary batteries is rising as a result of the growth of electric cars and mobile devices. Lithium-ion batteries are made up of a variety of materials, according to FUJIFILM Wako. Instax mini 90 is one of the famous product in Fujifilm, therefore, I suppose that the LIB can be potential batteries to use.

overview.name: The organic solvent
overview.description: An essential component is the solvent used in lithium-ion rechargeable batteries. I suppose as long as the LIB used in the instax mini 90. The organic solvent large probablity use in the this camera. Lithium ions flow between the positive and negative electrodes as the lithium salt in the solution is dissociated in the electrolyte. Water cannot be utilized as an electrolyte when lithium-ion rechargeable batteries are used at voltages exceeding 3 V; instead, organic solvents are used. Supplier of carbonate solvents is FUJIFILM Wako.

overview.name: Flow Reaction Catalyst
overview.description: Immobilized catalysts (solid and solid-phase catalysts) used in flow processes provide benefits such automation, equipment miniaturization, and thermal energy reduction. Additionally, because they do not release metal waste, they are perfect for green sustainable chemistry and advantageous in the fields of medicines and electronic materials because very little residual catalyst is present in the products. Based on the many advantages, it is possible to use in this camera. FUJIFILM Wako suggests highly active catalysts for flow processes that can still react at atmospheric pressure.

overview.name: X-Trans sensor
overview.description: The Fujifilm X-Trans sensor is one that Fujifilm created and uses in their X series of cameras. Sony Corporation is claimed to produce X-Trans sensors for Fujifilm. I suppose that there is a potential corporation relationship between Fujifilm and Sony company. As a result, maybe Fujifilm will chose X-Trans sensor created by Sony in this camera.

overview.name: Polycarbonates (pc)
overview.description: Covestro and SABIC Plastics are the two largest polycarbonate producers worldwide and together contribute nearly 40% of global capacity. Fujifilm is also world-wide company. Therefore, I suppose plastics was used in Fujifilm Polycarbonate (PC) from leading manufacturers and suppliers is Covestro or SABIC.

overview.name: glass
overview.description: When Fujifilm, a company that proudly etches "Made in Japan" onto almost all of its mirrorless cameras, its Taiwa factory in Sendai. It makes lenses like the 35mm f/2 and the just-introduced 100-400mm f/4.5-5.6. I am thinking maybe the lens glass of instax mini 90 made in Taiwa factory.

overview.name: A light-sensitive negative
overview.description: A light-sensitive negative is a film base coated with layers of silver halide grains, image dyes and Inter-layers. Each Polaroid photographic paper should have this layers. So, I think the fujifilm might have potential relationship between this factory and then it can used in the Instax mini 90.

overview.name: Transparent cover sheets
overview.description: This retains all the chemicals safely inside the film while allowing the image to be exposed to the negative. It is necessarily in the Fujifilm's photographic paper. Therefore, it is possible to use in the instax mini 90 printing paper camera box.

overview.name: Thin foil pods
overview.description: It is at the bottom of every frame and has just enough reagent in it to develop the image. This is a might supplier of fujifilm in the instax mini 90 of printing paper camera box.

They offer renowned customer service and carry Fuji Digital Photography, Fujifilm Instax, and Fuji Film & Darkroom Accessories.
